test.create_query: CREATE TABLE simple_key_flat_dictionary_source_table ( id UInt64, value_int UInt64, value_string String, value_decimal Decimal64(8), value_string_nullable Nullable(String) ) ENGINE = Memory;

CREATE DICTIONARY simple_key_flat_dictionary ( id UInt64, value_int UInt64, value_string String, value_decimal Decimal64(8), value_string_nullable Nullable(String) ) PRIMARY KEY id SOURCE(CLICKHOUSE(DB 'default' TABLE 'simple_key_flat_dictionary_source_table')) LAYOUT(FLAT()) LIFETIME(MIN 0 MAX 1000)
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO simple_key_flat_dictionary_source_table SELECT number, number, toString(number), toDecimal64(number, 8), toString(number) FROM system.numbers LIMIT 500000;
